scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter, 1895 October 5, Francis Marion Crawford writes to Clara Elizabeth Laughlin responding to the request of Laughlin (1873-1941), the Literary Editor of The Interior, for a photograph by directing her to write George P. Brete at Macmillans and thanks her for her interest in his novel Casa Braccio.
